name: A Bewitching Revolution
description: A Bewitching Revolution is a first-person adventure game about a communist witch living in a cyberpunk city. Use magic to help the city's residents organise collective forms of power and resistance!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5 Quad-Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 4000 Storage: 150 MB available space
